abstract: The company says the platform will help brands spend their ad money to maximize the effectiveness of campaigns across various media.
snippet: The company says the platform will help brands spend their ad money to maximize the effectiveness of campaigns across various media.
lead_paragraph: AOL introduced an advertising platform Tuesday that it says will help brands more effectively spend their money to maximize the impact of ad campaigns. The platform, called ONE by AOL, is the company’s latest push into ad tech as it seeks to compete with Facebook and Google.

headline.main: AOL Unveils ONE by AOL, an Advertising Platform
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; AOL Introduces Platform to Measure Ad Effectiveness
